name: Cannonball (Davingot)
description:
Hey Everyone, I started making this game at the end of last year since I caught a cold and was super bored.  It was just intended to be a short little project but it accidentally kind of spiraled into something that took a few months, lol.  anyways, I hope you enjoy it

Read before playing:

To unlock most of the skins, the challenge must be started by hitting play in the menu as opposed to selecting each level individually

Clicking level 1 from the level select screen will automatically start the challenge

The level select screen is for practice purposes, so you can go in and practice each level without penalties

(This game is best visible in full screen mode)

Instructions:

WASD or arrow keys to move

F to fire

Space to jump

Esc to go back to menu

Music by:

Rhys Williams and Davingot
